name: blouse
title: blouse
two description: The Purple Label line of Healing Hands Scrubs is engineered for performance and comfort. The easy care poly/rayon blend is durable while feeling luxurious against the skin. With just the right amount of stretch, Purple Label clothing is designed to move with you even through the longest shifts. This modern 'Jane' design shirt features a flattering Y-neck with triple-needle stitching details, two outside pockets, and princess stitching for a superior fit and style. 77% polyester/20% rayon/3% spandex. Fashionable fit. Center Back Length: 24

title: short
two description: These shorts from Andora make it easy to create a variety of stylish casual outfits. The mid-rise shorts are made from a comfortable, soft and lightweight cotton blend and feature a zip fly with button closure so you can get the perfect secure fit every time.
